casebody.data:
SCIGRIP, INC., et al.
v.
OSAE, et al. 139A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 5, 2018 Mr. Benjamin Thompson, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for SciGrip, Inc. Mr. Tobias S. Hampson, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for SciGrip, Inc. Mrs. J. Blakely Kiefer, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for SciGrip, Inc. Mr. George B. Mast, Smithfield, Attorney at Law, for Osae, Samuel B. Mr. Charles D. Mast, Smithfield, Attorney at Law, for Osae, Samuel B. Ms. Lily VP. Tuttle, Smithfield, Attorney at Law, for Osae, Samuel B. Mr. Philip Strach, Attorney at Law, for Scott Bader, Inc. Mr. Brodie D. Erwin, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Scott Bader, Inc.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the Joint Motion for Extension of Time to File Appellee Briefs filed on the 3rd of July 2018:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of July 2018."

Parties shall have up to and including the 6th day of August 2018 to file and serve Appellee briefs with this Court.
